original: @24b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @24b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajramahābala.

original: khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
analyzed: khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
translated: The practitioner who wishes to be initiated into the maṇḍala of the eight wrathful ones, endowed with samaya, should construct the maṇḍala in a pleasing place.

original: thog mar sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: thog mar sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin rdzogs par byas la /
translated: First, having completed the earth ritual just as it is,

original: de nas sta gon gyi cho ga ji ltar rigs par byas la /
analyzed: de nas sta gon gyi cho ga ji ltar rigs par byas la /
translated: then, having performed the rite of the preliminary practices as appropriate,

original: de nas thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ma nor bar rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: de nas thig dang tshon gyi cho ga ma nor bar rdzogs par byas la /
translated: then, having completed without error the rite of the lines and colors,

original: bum pa dgu la lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab /
analyzed: bum pa dgu la lha so so'i mtshan ma gdab /
translated: the nine vases should be marked with the individual characteristics of the deities.

original: dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa ser po bri /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa ser po bri /
translated: Draw an eight-spoked yellow maṇḍala.

original: lte ba ljang gu rtsibs mchan dmar po mu khyud dkar po la rdo rje ra ba nag por @25a * //
analyzed: lte ba ljang gu rtsibs mchan dmar po mu khyud dkar po la rdo rje ra ba nag por @25a * //
translated: The center is green, the spokes are red, the surrounding circle is white, and the vajra fence is black.

original: bya'o ; / gru chad ljang gur bya /
analyzed: bya'o ; / gru chad ljang gur bya /
translated: The corners are green.

original: sgo rigs dang 'dra ba la me ri dang / rdo rje'i ra ba mdzes pas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgo rigs dang 'dra ba la me ri dang / rdo rje'i ra ba mdzes pas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
translated: The gates are the same as the families, and the maṇḍala is surrounded by a beautiful ring of fire and vajra fence.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma bri /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma bri /
translated: In this way, draw the sign of Vajra-Vidāraṇa in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: rtsibs la khro bo brgyad kyi mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rtsibs la khro bo brgyad kyi mtshan ma'o //
translated: On the spokes, draw the signs of the eight wrathful ones.

original: go rims ma nor bar bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: go rims ma nor bar bri bar bya'o //
translated: Draw them without error in sequence.

original: de nas bum pa rnams lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bum pa rnams lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having placed the vases in the individual places of the deities, make offerings.

original: so so'i bum pa la khro bo so so'i phyag rgya bcing //
analyzed: so so'i bum pa la khro bo so so'i phyag rgya bcing //
translated: Tie the mudra of each individual wrathful one to each individual vase.

original: spyan drangs la sngags kyis gnyis su med par bstims la /
analyzed: spyan drangs la sngags kyis gnyis su med par bstims la /
translated: Invite them and dissolve them into the two without duality with the mantra.

original: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bsre bar byas la /
analyzed: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bsre bar byas la /
translated: Then, mix them into nonduality with the awareness beings.

original: de dag gi sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi bi dhi nas 'byung ba bzhin gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor gyi bi dhi nas 'byung ba bzhin gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Their colors and hand implements should be clarified according to the maṇḍala rite.

original: lha so so'i thugs gnas bzla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyi bar na sngags so so'i rang sgra dang bcas pas dmigs la /
analyzed: lha so so'i thugs gnas bzla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyi bar na sngags so so'i rang sgra dang bcas pas dmigs la /
translated: The maṇḍala of the moon is in the heart of each deity. On top of that is a maṇḍala of the sun. Between those two, visualize the individual mantras with their individual sounds.

original: dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa shar du mtha' yas /
analyzed: dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa shar du mtha' yas /
translated: In the east of the central principal figure, Vajravidāraṇa, is Amitābha.

original: shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba /🔽lhor gnod mdzes /
analyzed: shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba / lhor gnod mdzes /
translated: In the southeast is Amṛtakuṇḍali.🔽In the south is Nīladaṇḍa.

original: lho nub tu khro bo mngon mtho //
analyzed: lho nub tu khro bo mngon mtho //
translated: In the southwest is Krodha-abhimukhī.

original: nub tu rta mgrin /🔽nub byang du gzhan gyis mi thub ba /
analyzed: nub tu rta mgrin / nub byang du gzhan gyis mi thub ba /
translated: In the west is Hayagrīva.🔽In the northwest is Aparājita.

original: byang du gtum po //
analyzed: byang du gtum po //
translated: In the north is Caṇḍa.

original: byang shar du gshin rje /
analyzed: byang shar du gshin rje /
translated: In the northeast is Yama.

original: sgo rnams su sgo ma gzhan dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: sgo rnams su sgo ma gzhan dang 'dra'o //
translated: At the gates are the other gate-keepers.

original: de ltar so sor bum pa'i nang du gsal bar bskyed la /
analyzed: de ltar so sor bum pa'i nang du gsal bar bskyed la /
translated: Thus, visualize each one clearly inside the vase.

original: sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis khrus byas gos gsar pa gyon la nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis khrus byas gos gsar pa gyon la nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The practitioner themselves should bathe, put on new clothes, perform the near-purity and sprinkling, and so forth, and then engage in the recitation.

original: lha so so'i thugs ka'i nyi zla'i bar gyi sngags kyi rang sgra dang / bdag nyid kyis brjod pa'i sgra dang 'khor bar dmigs te bzlas so ;
analyzed: lha so so'i thugs ka'i nyi zla'i bar gyi sngags kyi rang sgra dang / bdag nyid kyis brjod pa'i sgra dang 'khor bar dmigs te bzlas so ;
translated: Visualize the self-sound of the mantra between the sun and moon at the heart of each deity, and the sound of one's own recitation, and recite.

original: / na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: / na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
translated: Namo ratnatrayāya.

original: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ya /
analyzed: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ya /
translated: Namo candavajrapāṇaye.

original: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
analyzed: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
translated: Mahāyakṣasenāpataye.

original: aom ma tha ma tha badzra h'um phat /🔽aom dhu na dhu na badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ma tha ma tha badzra h'um phat / aom dhu na dhu na badzra h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ matha matha vajra hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ dhuna dhuna vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom da ha da ha badzra h'um phat /🔽aom pa tsa pa tsa badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: aom da ha da ha badzra h'um phat / aom pa tsa pa tsa badzra h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ daha daha vajra hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ paca paca vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dha ra dha ra badzra h'um phat /🔽aom dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: aom dha ra dha ra badzra h'um phat / aom dh'a ra ya dh'a ra ya badzra h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ dhara dhara vajra hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ dhāraya dhāraya vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: aom d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ dāruna dāruna vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom tstshinda tstshinda badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: aom tstshinda tstshinda badzra h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ chinda chinda vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces bum pa re re la stong phrag re bzlas te /
analyzed: ces bum pa re re la stong phrag re bzlas te /
translated: Recite one thousand times for each vase.

original: brgya brgya'i bar du p'u dza lnga lnga dbul lo //
analyzed: brgya brgya'i bar du p'u dza lnga lnga dbul lo //
translated: Offer the five offerings one hundred times.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyis lha 'od du zhu chu dang gnyis su med par bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyis lha 'od du zhu chu dang gnyis su med par bsre bar bya'o //
translated: Through samādhi, the deity melts into light and mixes inseparably with the water.

original: de nyid las 'od 'phros pas rang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid las 'od 'phros pas rang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: Light radiates from that and accomplishes the benefit of self and other.

original: de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin @25b du bskur ro //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin @25b du bskur ro //
translated: Then confer empowerment as it occurs in the ritual of conferring the empowerment.

original: bkra shis gsol /
analyzed: bkra shis gsol /
translated: Make the auspicious prayers.

original: bgegs rnams las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / chus brab pa dang / rma bya'i sgros bya ba pa dang / me long gis phyi ba dang / d'u ra bas brdeg par bya'o //🔽sarba gra he sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bgegs rnams las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir dang / chus brab pa dang / rma bya'i sgros bya ba pa dang / me long gis phyi ba dang / d'u ra bas brdeg par bya'o // sarba gra he sv'a h'a /
translated: use peacock feathers, use a mirror, and beat with a stick.🔽Sarva grahe svaha!

original: sarba dur sv'a pna sv'a h'a /🔽sarba bi kalpa sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba dur sv'a pna sv'a h'a / sarba bi kalpa sv'a h'a /
translated: Sarva durga svaha!🔽 Sarva vikalpa svaha!

original: sarba rdzv'a re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba rdzv'a re sv'a h'a /
translated: Sarva rjava svaha!

original: de ltar 'di dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas nad dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'di dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas nad dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, having conferred empowerment into the mandala, one will be liberated from all illnesses, spirits, and so forth.

original: khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad kyis rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: khro bo brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad kyis rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The empowerment into the mandala of the eight wrathful ones, based on the tantra, composed by the master Dipamkarabhadra, is complete.🔽
